attributes.action: Give 16 year olds more confidentiality with their doctors sex-wise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to persuade doctors to lower the confidentiality age to 16, giving 16 year olds the freedom to speak willingly about sex, pregnancy or anything else they may have on their minds without their parents being notified.

rejection.details: This appears to already be the case, please see: http://www.fpa.org.uk/Information/Factsheets/consent
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
